title: Lider de Audiencias - Italic Sans
content:
Hello,

Anyone recognizes this? Seems like a FB Hermes Italic if there was anything like that, but with very strange details.

Thanks!  
a.

author: adriano

comments.content: It is FB Hermes bold sheared 4º... arghhh :S
